description: Grants permissions to create a new membership.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: An optional element used in combination with CreateMembership. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: membershipName
parameters.description: Required element use in combination with CreateMembership to create a name for the membership.

parameters.name: incidentResponseTeam
parameters.description: Required element use in combination with CreateMembership to add customer incident response team members and trusted partners to the membership. (dict) ---

parameters.name: optInFeatures
parameters.description: Optional element to enable the monitoring and investigation opt-in features for the service. (dict) ---

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Optional element for customer configured tags. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: membershipId
nested_items.description: Response element for CreateMembership providing the newly created membership ID.
